name: Ecosim (Evil Tortoise)
description: This game has two creatures so far. The fox, which is self-explanatory, and the Piffogriss which is a stupid cute one-eyed alien that is trying to take over the world. This game simulates an ecosystem with both of these creatures. The game is currently in beta and I have 2 major updates planned one which adds natural selection and another that adds more creatures.
